dct_title_s: Survey Mississippi Fortifications from Port Hudson to Bayou Sara
dct_alternative_sm: Survey of Mississippi fortifications from Port Hudson to Bayou Sara : J. Covington, top. engr.
dct_description_sm: Pages 217-218 of the April 4, 1863 issue of Harper's Weekly.
Ill. on verso: A night scout in the southwest - surprise of an outpost, and survey of the rebel guns.
Map shows fortifications, land surveys, landowners, roads, and railroads for the vicinity of parishes of east and west Baton Rouge and West Feliciana along the Mississippi River.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
